TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RibbonTabHeadersPanel extends System.Windows.Controls.Panel implements class System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.IScrollInfo

Docs.summary: Represents a panel that supports horizontal scrolling of the tab headers in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The RibbonTabHeadersPanel provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.param: The size that the needs to position its child elements.
Docs.summary: Positions and sizes the child elements in this .
Gets a value that indicates whether scrolling on the horizontal axis is possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Primitives.RibbonTabHeadersPanel> provides horizontal scrolling by line for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonTabHeader> controls in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>. Scrolling up or down, and scrolling by page is not supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> value of the panel’s internal <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>.

Docs.value: A reference to the that this control belongs to. The registered default is . For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is set on the parent control and is inherited by the child controls. It is used to access visual style brushes defined on the class. ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
